title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 643.4 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 643.4 - Records

State Regulations
OPWDD, on being made aware that the basis under which a
record was made available by OPWDD to NICS does not apply or no longer applies, shall, as soon as practicable: (a) update, correct, modify or remove the record from any database that the Federal
or State government maintains and makes available to NICS, consistent with the
rules pertaining to that database; and
(b) notify the United States Attorney General
that such basis no longer applies so that the record system in which the record
is maintained is kept up to date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
643.4

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
